Package com.twcable.grabbit.tools.jobstarter

Classes around starting Grabbit copy jobs on a client.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HostAndJobIds
    Tuple of a host URI and a Publisher of job ids.
    JobsConfigFileReader
    Reads and parses the Grabbit Client configuration file.
    JobStarter
    Interface to start jobs on a Grabbit client.

Package com.twcable.grabbit.tools.jobstarter Description

Classes around starting Grabbit copy jobs on a client.

The principle class is JobStarter.
